body_html: I'm hitting this issue as well. My use case is the same as @jared-mess, where I train the model on machine A, download the model directory to a machine B, and try to restore the model from the model directory on B. I'm on 0.10.0.

body: I'm hitting this issue as well.  My use case is the same as @jared-mess, where I train the model on machine A, download the model directory to a machine B, and try to restore the model from the model directory on B.  I'm on `0.10.0`.
